title: Rikafip
author: Rikafip
content: Is anyone else having the same issue for the last hour or so? All the other pages are opening very fast but for some reason bitcointalk is extremely slow to the point of being barely usable.

comments.author: Odusko
comments.body: Quote from: Rikafip on July 09, 2023, 09:53:23 AMIs anyone else having the same issue for the last hour or so? All the other pages are opening very fast but for some reason bitcoin talk is extremely slow to the point of being barely usable.Hey everyone be careful when making posts on bitcointalk because due to the congestion of the network, your replies may have been posted with the normal procedures, and if you are not careful you may post the same replies multiple times if you keep clicking the post button your bitcointalk comment session. So everyone is advised to be manual as much as possible by checking your last post history to know if your comment has been posted or not.
